display_long_description:
🎣 Find Your Escape in Real VR Fishing

Leave the noise behind and cast away into one of VR’s most serene, beautiful worlds.
Whether you’re chasing trophy fish, relaxing by a mountain lake, or sharing stories with friends on a sunny coast, Real VR Fishing is your personal getaway—anytime you need it.

🌎 A World Worth Exploring

Cast your line across 40 beautifully crafted fishing spots spanning Korea, the U.S., and Japan. Expand your adventure with DLC packs, unlocking 100+ stunning locations and 300+ fish species to discover and collect.

[media]

🐟 Level Up, Customize, and Collect

Progress from casual angler to master fisherman. Customize your avatar, build your personal aquarium, and unlock rare fish to showcase your skills.

[media]

🎧 Your Perfect Fishing Companion

Stream your favorite music, browse the web, or watch videos—all without leaving your fishing spot. Real VR Fishing turns every session into a true moment of relaxation.
[media]

Additional Features:

🎣 Play solo or fish together with up to 3 friends — voice chat and share the moment.
🏆 Awarded Oculus Game of the Year 2019 — with monthly updates and seasonal events to keep it fresh.

🌟 Your Paradise Awaits

Real peace. Real beauty. Real VR Fishing.
Your next great escape is just one cast away.
[media]
